Question: The lunar crater this person, 31 mi (50 km) from the Apollo 11 landing site, and asteroid 6469 this person are named in his honor.
Hints: A jeep driven by a roommate from flight school picked this person up; it is unknown what happened to the wreckage of No.
In 1947, at age 17, this person began studying aeronautical engineering at Purdue University.
Many of the test pilots at Edwards praised this person's engineering ability.
